title: Introduction To DrugExposureDiagnostics
text: DrugExposureDiagnostics package, diagnostics conducted ingredient level. use “acetaminophen” example. brief look ingredient. can run available checks time using ´executeChecks()´ function. return list contains results check. Thecdm database reference OMOP CDM using CDMConnector package. ingredients list ingredients interests, default 1125315 acetaminophen. subsetToConceptId vector drug concept ID’s subset . checks allows select checks executed, default, checks run.sample number samples, default, 1 million drug record samples used. minCellCount minimum number events report, numbers lower obscured. can check results available ´executeChecks()´ Let’s take look results. ingredientConcepts contains information concept ids used database given ingredient. case acetaminophen, following drugs contain acetaminophen ingredient. running checks, can write CSV files zip file disk using writeResultToDisk() function.
code: executeChecks(cdm,               ingredients = c(1125315),               subsetToConceptId = NULL,               checks = c("missing", "exposureDuration", "type", "route","sourceConcept", "daysSupply", "verbatimEndDate","dailyDose", "sig", "quantity", "histogram"),                minCellCount = 5,               sample = 1000000,               verbose = FALSE ) all_checks<-executeChecks(cdm, ingredients = 1125315) #> population after earliestStartDate smaller than sample, ignoring date for sampling #> Joining with `by = join_by(ingredient_concept_id)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(ingredient_concept_id)` names(all_checks) #>  [1] "conceptSummary"                "missingValuesOverall"          #>  [3] "missingValuesByConcept"        "drugExposureDurationOverall"   #>  [5] "drugExposureDurationByConcept" "drugTypesOverall"              #>  [7] "drugTypesByConcept"            "drugRoutesOverall"             #>  [9] "drugRoutesByConcept"           "drugSourceConceptsOverall"     #> [11] "drugSourceConceptsByConcept"   "drugDaysSupply"                #> [13] "drugDaysSupplyByConcept"       "drugVerbatimEndDate"           #> [15] "drugVerbatimEndDateByConcept"  "drugDose"                      #> [17] "drugDoseByConcept"             "drugSig"                       #> [19] "drugSigByConcept"              "drugQuantity"                  #> [21] "drugQuantityByConcept"         "drugIngredientOverview"        #> [23] "drugIngredientPresence"        "drugDaysSupplyHistogram"       #> [25] "drugQuantityHistogram"         "drugDurationHistogram"         #> [27] "diagnostics_summary" datatable(all_checks$ingredientConcepts,   rownames = FALSE ) writeResultToDisk(all_checks,                   databaseId = "your_database_id",                    outputFolder = "output_folder")

title: Summary of checks
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(dplyr)  # acetaminophen concept id is 1125315 acetaminophen <- 1125315 cdm <- getEunomiaCdm(ingredientId = acetaminophen) #> attempting to extract and load /tmp/RtmpsbFMuQ/GiBleed_5.3.zip acetaminophen_checks <- executeChecks(cdm = cdm, ingredients = acetaminophen)

title: Summary of checks
code: acetaminophen_checks$diagnostics_summary %>%    glimpse() #> Rows: 1 #> Columns: 12 #> $ ingredient                                                <chr> "Acetaminoph… #> $ ingredient_concept_id                                     <dbl> 1125315 #> $ n_records                                                 <int> 2470 #> $ proportion_of_records_by_drug_type                        <chr> "NA (2470, 1… #> $ proportion_of_records_by_route_type                       <chr> "No matching… #> $ proportion_of_records_with_dose_form                      <glue> "0 (0%)" #> $ proportion_of_records_missing_denominator_unit_concept_id <glue> "0 (0%)" #> $ median_amount_value_q05_q95                               <glue> "1 (1-1) [0,… #> $ median_quantity_q05_q95                                   <glue> "0 (0-0) [24… #> $ median_drug_exposure_days_q05_q95                         <glue> "15 (1-68) … #> $ proportion_of_records_with_negative_drug_exposure_days    <glue> "0 (0%)" #> $ result_obscured                                           <lgl> FALSE

title: Authors and Citation
text: Ger Inberg. Author, maintainer. Edward Burn. Author. Yuchen Guo. Contributor. Marti Catala. Contributor. Mike Du. Contributor. Theresa Burkard. Contributor. Xintong Li. Contributor. Ross Williams. Contributor. Erasmus MC. Copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Inberg G, Burn E (2023). DrugExposureDiagnostics: Diagnostics OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records. R package version 0.4.5.
code: @Manual{,   title = {DrugExposureDiagnostics: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records},   author = {Ger Inberg and Edward Burn},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.4.5}, }

what: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: goal DrugExposureDiagnostics summarise ingredient specific drug exposure data OMOP CDM.

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: can install DrugExposureDiagnostics CRAN like : install development version:
code: install.packages("DrugExposureDiagnostics") install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("darwin-eu/DrugExposureDiagnostics")

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: order use example data eunomia dataset, need set environment variable. can like : {r} usethis::edit_r_environ() EUNOMIA_DATA_FOLDER = “/mypath/eunomiaData” save file restart RStudio

title: Diagnostics for OMOP Common Data Model Drug Records
text: Let´s look ingredient acetaminophen (https://athena.ohdsi.org/search-terms/terms/1125315). can run checks available ´DrugExposureDiagnostics´ using ´executeChecks´ function. output list contains following set tibbles: first item contains information concept ids used database given ingredient. tibbles contain information various checks performed. example, can see summary missingness ingredient-related records drug exposure table, overall concept. can also see summary drug exposure duration (drug_exposure_end_date - drug_exposure_end_date + 1), overall concept. information checks performed please see package vignettes. running checks can write CSVs disk using writeResultToDisk function.
code: library(DrugExposureDiagnostics) library(CDMConnector) library(dplyr) cdm <- getEunomiaCdm() all_checks <- executeChecks(cdm, 1125315, minCellCount = NULL) #> population after earliestStartDate smaller than sample, ignoring date for sampling #> Joining with `by = join_by(ingredient_concept_id)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(ingredient_concept_id)` names(all_checks) #>  [1] "conceptSummary"                "missingValuesOverall"          #>  [3] "missingValuesByConcept"        "drugExposureDurationOverall"   #>  [5] "drugExposureDurationByConcept" "drugTypesOverall"              #>  [7] "drugTypesByConcept"            "drugRoutesOverall"             #>  [9] "drugRoutesByConcept"           "drugSourceConceptsOverall"     #> [11] "drugSourceConceptsByConcept"   "drugDaysSupply"                #> [13] "drugDaysSupplyByConcept"       "drugVerbatimEndDate"           #> [15] "drugVerbatimEndDateByConcept"  "drugDose"                      #> [17] "drugDoseByConcept"             "drugSig"                       #> [19] "drugSigByConcept"              "drugQuantity"                  #> [21] "drugQuantityByConcept"         "drugIngredientOverview"        #> [23] "drugIngredientPresence"        "diagnostics_summary" glimpse(all_checks$conceptSummary) #> Rows: 2 #> Columns: 24 #> $ drug_concept_id             <dbl> 40162522, 1127078 #> $ drug                        <chr> "Acetaminophen
